title: Knight Shift
description:
A re-release package of the combination RTS / RPG game, issued under the Eurpean title rather than the original US name Once Upon a Knight.

Set across three story-driven RTS campaigns, Knight Shift also brings in RPG elements as it tells the tale of a banished prince fighting to reclaim his kingdom with the help of a kindly wizard and some uniquely interesting characters. The game breaks from the norm of RTS adventures with its humorous story mode and multiplayer bouts for up to 8 players.
